io.catalyze.sdk.android

Class CatalyzeListener<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.catalyze.sdk.android.CatalyzeListener<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.android.volley.Response.Listener<T>

    public abstract class CatalyzeListener<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.android.volley.Response.Listener<T>
    Response handler for Catalyze API calls. A CatalyzeListener must be passed to all Catalyze API call methods. T should be the type of the expected response, i.e. if retrieving an authenticated user, a CatalyzeUser, then CatalyzeUser. If retrieving a CustomClass, then CustomClass. If an error occurs a CatalyzeError will be passed back as a response.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CatalyzeListener(Context context)
      The listener must be provided with a context to execute under (this is used beneath the Catalyze SDK by Volley).
